snippet.title: Korean American Museum
snippet.description: Check out the exhibits and programs featuring Korean - American history and culture.

snippet.title: Trammell and Margaret Crow Collection of Asian Art
snippet.description: While you're here you can explore the cultures and religions of the regions that the artwork comes from.

snippet.title: Ancestors in the Americas
snippet.description: Discover early Asian \- American history and immigration through an historical timeline and documents, a bibliography, and a new PBS series.

snippet.title: East West Players
snippet.description: Learn about the first Asian Pacific - American theatre in the country.

snippet.title: Japanese American Citizens League
snippet.description: Discover the nation's oldest and largest Asian \- American civil rights organization.

snippet.title: Harvest Moon Festival - Zhong Qiu Jie
snippet.description: Discover the legend behind Chang - Er, the Moon Goddess and learn how people in Montreal, Canada celebrate this Asian holiday.

snippet.title: Precious Cargo
snippet.description: Follow a group of adopted Vietnamese - American children on their journey back to Vietnam to learn about their history and roots. Discover the history of the Vietnam War and learn about " Operation Babylift " from this PBS site.

snippet.title: Daughter From Danang
snippet.description: Go behind the scenes of this award - winning movie about a young Vietnamese - American woman who was adopted by an American woman after the Vietnam War as part of Operation Babylift and her return to Vietnam to meet her family.

snippet.title: Mehendi Party: Premarital Tradition
snippet.description: Discover the traditional art of decorating women's hands and feet with henna to celebrate Pakistani and Indian weddings.
